Sanguine-Choleric.name: Jack Ma
Sanguine-Choleric.description:
Energetic, visionary, and highly ambitious. Known for his resilience and ability to inspire others with his entrepreneurial mindset.
Success: Co-founder of Alibaba Group, revolutionized e-commerce in China, and became a global business icon.
Milestone Achievements: Founded Alibaba in 1999, led it to one of the largest IPOs in history ($25 billion in 2014), and expanded into various sectors, including cloud computing and digital finance.
Net Worth: Estimated at over $20 billion.

Sanguine-Choleric.name: Bill Cosby
Sanguine-Choleric.description:
Outgoing, humorous, and confident, once celebrated for his charisma and communication skills.
Success: Formerly one of the most influential comedians and actors in American television history.
Milestone Achievements: Starred in 'The Cosby Show,' which was a cultural phenomenon in the 1980s. Also had a successful career as an author and philanthropist.
Net Worth: Once estimated at around $400 million, but significantly impacted by legal issues.

Sanguine-Choleric.name: Priyanka Chopra
Sanguine-Choleric.description:
Charismatic, ambitious, and highly adaptable, excelling in multiple industries.
Success: Internationally recognized actress, singer, and entrepreneur with a strong presence in both Bollywood and Hollywood.
Milestone Achievements: Won Miss World 2000, starred in 'Quantico,' and became a global UNICEF Goodwill Ambassador. Successfully transitioned into Hollywood and married Nick Jonas.
Net Worth: Estimated at $75 million.

Sanguine-Choleric.name: Will Smith
Sanguine-Choleric.description:
Charismatic, confident, and dynamic, known for his boundless energy and ability to reinvent himself.
Success: A-list actor, rapper, and producer with massive influence in Hollywood.
Milestone Achievements: Starred in 'The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air,' 'Men in Black,' 'Independence Day,' and 'King Richard' (winning an Oscar). Also built a strong social media presence.
Net Worth: Estimated at $350 million.

Sanguine-Choleric.name: Tony Robbins
Sanguine-Choleric.description:
High-energy, motivational, and persuasive, with a relentless drive to help others succeed.
Success: One of the most successful motivational speakers, authors, and business strategists in the world.
Milestone Achievements: Authored bestsellers like 'Awaken the Giant Within' and 'Unlimited Power.' Works with global leaders, athletes, and business moguls to improve performance.
Net Worth: Estimated at $600 million.

Sanguine-Choleric.name: Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson
Sanguine-Choleric.description:
Charismatic, determined, and exceptionally driven, blending athleticism with business acumen.
Success: Transitioned from a WWE superstar into one of the highest-paid actors and successful entrepreneurs.
Milestone Achievements: Starred in 'Fast & Furious' and 'Jumanji' franchises, owns Teremana Tequila, and co-founded the XFL football league.
Net Worth: Estimated at $800 million.

Sanguine-Choleric.name: Oprah Winfrey
Sanguine-Choleric.description:
Visionary, deeply empathetic, and incredibly persuasive, with a powerful presence.
Success: Built a media empire and became one of the most influential women in the world.
Milestone Achievements: Hosted 'The Oprah Winfrey Show' for 25 years, founded OWN Network, and became a billionaire philanthropist.
Net Worth: Estimated at $2.5 billion.

Sanguine-Choleric.name: Richard Branson
Sanguine-Choleric.description:
Adventurous, fearless, and highly innovative, thriving on high-energy challenges.
Success: Founder of Virgin Group, spanning over 400 companies across various industries.
Milestone Achievements: Launched Virgin Records, Virgin Atlantic, and Virgin Galactic, pushing boundaries in space travel.
Net Worth: Estimated at $3 billion.

Sanguine-Melancholy.name: Trevor Noah
Sanguine-Melancholy.description:
Witty, insightful, and deeply introspective, balancing humor with sharp social commentary.
Success: Acclaimed comedian, author, and former host of 'The Daily Show.'
Milestone Achievements: Hosted 'The Daily Show' from 2015 to 2022, wrote the bestselling memoir 'Born a Crime,' and performed sold-out global comedy tours.
Net Worth: Estimated at $100 million.

Sanguine-Melancholy.name: Lupita Nyong’o
Sanguine-Melancholy.description:
Elegant, expressive, and artistically profound, with a passion for storytelling and cultural impact.
Success: Academy Award-winning actress known for her powerful performances.
Milestone Achievements: Won an Oscar for '12 Years a Slave,' starred in 'Black Panther,' and became a prominent advocate for diversity in Hollywood.
Net Worth: Estimated at $10 million.

Sanguine-Melancholy.name: Robin Williams
Sanguine-Melancholy.description:
Brilliant, high-energy, and deeply empathetic, blending rapid-fire humor with heartfelt depth.
Success: Legendary comedian and actor known for his improvisational genius.
Milestone Achievements: Won an Academy Award for 'Good Will Hunting,' starred in classics like 'Dead Poets Society' and 'Mrs. Doubtfire,' and left a lasting impact on comedy and film.

Creative powerhouse with a gift for crafting compelling and emotionally rich narratives.
Success: One of the most successful television producers and screenwriters in Hollywood.
Milestone Achievements: Created hit shows like 'Grey’s Anatomy,' 'Scandal,' and 'Bridgerton.' Signed a groundbreaking deal with Netflix.

Sanguine-Melancholy.description:
Masterful storyteller with a keen eye for social injustice and human nature.

Charismatic, hardworking, and fun-loving, seamlessly blending action with humor.

Sanguine-Phlegmatic.name: Jim Carrey

Expressive, eccentric, and deeply philosophical, channeling raw emotion into his performances.

Sanguine-Phlegmatic.name: Ed Sheeran

Deeply introspective, analytical, and visionary in psychology.

Milestone Achievements: Developed concepts like the collective unconscious and archetypes, revolutionizing psychology.
Net Worth: Not applicable.

Phlegmatic-Melancholy.name: George Orwell
Phlegmatic-Melancholy.description:
Observant, critical, and deeply analytical.
Success: Influential writer and political thinker.
Milestone Achievements: Authored 1984 and Animal Farm, shaping discussions on totalitarianism and surveillance.
Net Worth: Not applicable.

Phlegmatic-Melancholy.name: Harper Lee
Phlegmatic-Melancholy.description:
Quiet, observant, and profoundly insightful.
Success: Pulitzer Prize-winning author.
Milestone Achievements: Wrote To Kill a Mockingbird, a defining novel on racial injustice and morality.
Net Worth: Estimated at $35 million (estate).

Phlegmatic-Melancholy.name: Alan Turing
Phlegmatic-Melancholy.description:
Brilliant, methodical, and deeply private.
Success: Mathematician and father of modern computing.
Milestone Achievements: Cracked the Enigma code, laying the foundation for artificial intelligence and modern cryptography.
Net Worth: Not applicable.

Phlegmatic-Melancholy.name: Jane Goodall
Phlegmatic-Melancholy.description:
Patient, empathetic, and meticulous in research.
Success: World-renowned primatologist and conservationist.
Milestone Achievements: Transformed our understanding of chimpanzees and animal behavior, advocating for conservation worldwide.
Net Worth: Estimated at $10 million.

Phlegmatic-Melancholy.name: Steve Wozniak
Phlegmatic-Melancholy.description:
Precise, innovative, and technically brilliant.
Success: Co-founder of Apple Inc.
Milestone Achievements: Designed the Apple I and Apple II computers, pioneering the personal computing revolution.
